title: Melvin Escarlan Portfolio
description: My portfolio showcasing my personal projects. This site is built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JQuery, Foundation 5, AJAX, JSON and iconfonts.

title: Shutterbugg
description: A mockup landing page built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, and Foundation 5 grid system and button. It originally uses Bootstrap grid system and button.

title: FlashCards
description: A simple web-based Flashcard app that you can use to test your web skills and knowledge. It randomly generates questions on each reload or by clicking NEXT button. Built with HTML5, CSS3, SASS/SCSS, Vanilla JavaScript, AJAX and JSON

title: PaintThat
description: A simple painting web application with color preview, size, fill, undo and clear all tools included. Built with HTML5 canvas, JavaScript, JQuery & Foundation 5 sliders.

title: LocatorUI
description: A simple, responsive UI that lets you locate branches (i.e. stores, resellers etc.) and nearby branches. Built with HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, AJAX, and JSON
